column4: whats the best torrent client for ubuntu in your guyses opinion?
are you sure you werent lazy to look around
there is a client for it on android so I can add, remove and manage my torrents from my phone.
i'm on 10.04 lts :\ will it still work?
yes but the old libs and such make it harder to work with, should be a similar method
didn't help for the external sd card :\
try the gksudo nautilus $HOME    see if you get write access. Sounds like you haven't been unplugging the device correctly
not sure what that's supposed to do
when you unplug the phine, do you use the safetly remove option?
or do you just rip it out?
i just rip it out, there is no safety remove option on the phone itself
